snippet: The layoffs at Meredith, publisher of Family Circle and Better Homes and Gardens, will cut its work force to around 3,900.
abstract: Magazine publisher Meredith Corp lays off roughly 100 employees as part of larger reorganization.
lead_paragraph: The layoffs at Meredith, publisher of Family Circle and Better Homes and Gardens, will cut its work force to around 3,900.

headline.main: Meredith, Publisher of Magazines, Lays Off 100 as It Reorganizes
headline.print_headline: 100 Layoffs as Publisher of Magazines Reorganizes
